description: Karen Sandler, Executive Director of Software Freedom Conservancy, delivers the keynote at the Free Software Foundation's annual conference, LibrePlanet 2015.  She discussed Conservancy's work enforcing the GPL and the VMware lawsuit.
short_description: Karen Sandler, Executive Director of Software Freedom Conservancy, delivers the keynote at the Free Software Foundation's annual
title: Karen Sandler keynotes FSF's LibrePlanet 2015 about GPL Enforcement
